parameters.name: BackupMethod
parameters.description:
The backup method. Valid values:

- **logical**: logical backup

- **physical**: physical backup

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

parameters.name: FromApp
parameters.description: The source of the request. The default value is OpenAPI. You do not need to set this parameter.

parameters.name: InstanceClass
parameters.description:
The instance class. Valid values:

- **micro**: Entry

- **small**: Basic

- **medium**: Standard

- **large**: Enhanced

- **xlarge**: Enhanced (no traffic limit)

> The higher the instance class, the better the performance of backup and recovery. For more information, see [Specifications](~~84372~~).

parameters.name: InstanceType
parameters.description:
The database instance type. Valid values:

- **RDS**

- **PolarDB**

- **DDS**: Alibaba Cloud MongoDB

- **Kvstore**: Alibaba Cloud Redis

- **Other**: A database that is connected over the Internet.

- **dg**: A self-managed database without a public IP address and port that is connected through Database Gateway (DG).

parameters.name: PayType
parameters.description:
The payment method. Valid value:

**prepay**: subscription

parameters.name: Period
parameters.description:
The billing cycle of the subscription instance. Valid values:

- **Year**

- **Month**

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description:
The region ID of the DBS instance. This parameter is required. Call the [DescribeRegions](~~2869853~~) operation to view the regions that DBS supports.

> For more information, see [Endpoints](~~2869810~~).

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: UsedTime
parameters.description:
The subscription duration. Valid values:

- If you set the **Period** parameter to **Year**, the value of **UsedTime** can be 1 to 5.

- If you set the **Period** parameter to **Month**, the value of **UsedTime** can be 1 to 11.
